Use the data training to predict the university 

```{r}
library(ISLR)
College
```

```{r}
College.train <- College[1:500, c("Outstate","Grad.Rate","Private")]
College.test <- College[501:777, c("Outstate","Grad.Rate","Private")]
```


```{r}
library(class)
knn.pred <- knn(train = College.train[,1:2], test = College.test[,1:2], cl )
```
